org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

类 CompositeImmutableSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.Segment
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.ImmutableSegment
        • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.CompositeImmutableSegment
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MemStoreSizing

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class CompositeImmutableSegment
extends ImmutableSegment
    The CompositeImmutableSegments is created as a collection of ImmutableSegments and supports the interface of a single ImmutableSegments. The CompositeImmutableSegments is planned to be used only as a snapshot, thus only relevant interfaces are supported

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.ImmutableSegment
